title: Iris (Multicolor Necklace)
content:
Hey peeps, how are y’all doing? Good I guess Last month, I made my dear Iris (Multicolor Necklace) and she was ordered immediately I put up her picture on Facebook.

Iris is that one neck piece that can accessorize practically any color of outfit in your closet simply because she’s made up of plenty colors, hence, the name Iris (look up the meaning 😉 ) Jewlry lovers will be drooling already 😀 I know you’re wondering what Iris looks like right? There she is:

I had sold her but still put up her picture on Instagram and someone else buzzed for Iris but wanted some adjustments made to the original design. We came up with stud earrings instead of the dropping style and took out the whites at the back. Here she is:

 

You can rock Iris however you want and with whatever outfit, it’s all about your personal style. Here are some images I found of ladies rocking multicolor necklaces ( Sources: lyst.com & pintrest):

  

So which of the variants of Iris do you prefer? I’d like to know. More orders are coming in for Iris and she can be customized to suit your style so feel free to buzz. We ship worldwide so distance ain’t a thing! 😉

Handcrafted with Love,

The Craftress.

title: PRODUCT REVIEW: SLEEK STUDIO FLASH A POUT LIP COLOR
content:
Hello fam this is my very first product review and I’m excited to get started so here goes…
I love makeup, colors and getting to apply makeup on people is one of the most fulfilling activities I do. I was mega excited when I got some products from Sleek Studio for review; in this post I’ll be reviewing the Sleek Studio Flash a Pout lip colors.

These lip colors come in 6 gorgeous shades (click on images for clearer view) and I’ll be showing swatches of all the shades. Sit back and enjoy 😉

Packaging

As you can see in the picture above, they come in a very sleek package (pun intended 😀 ) Sleek Studio also introduced a revolutionary packaging as the actual container of the lip color has a miniature mirror and a LED light on it. This means you can apply your makeup on the go at any time and anywhere irrespective of the lighting condition. The tube is transparent, what you see is what you get. It is also quite compact and can fit into your pocket; this is a plus as you can carry it around effortlessly. The applicator wand is soft and makes application enjoyable.

Product

These lip colors are VERY pigmented and matte! They dry fast and they feel so weightless on the lips. If you wear any of these shades you would actually forget you have lip color on and that is a very big plus. I wore this lip color in Siren to an event last weekend and I shone like a star in the sky 😀  6 hours after applying it, it was still very bright and gorgeous on me and it only went out after I bathed and wiped my lips. It has a silky feel on the lips and I’m sure any groom would love to kiss ‘em off his bride’s lips 😉

Since these lip colors are very matte, it is advisable to moisturize your lips before using them. To get a little bit of shine on your lips, you can top up with the Sleek Studio “Glowshine” which also comes in different shades.

Shades

Revolution 101 – this is a very intense orange color. This definitely evokes a style revolution, not for the faint hearted!

Siren 102 – this is a gorgeous red. Like its name implies, you will definitely be noticed any time you wear this.

Naivety 103 – this is a deep and strong pink shade, almost electric. Naivety will surely birth the diva in you.

Duke 104 – this is a dark purple (plum) shade. When you see a lady rocking Duke, you must address her as Duchess; for she is fearless and daring!

Coined 105 – this is a beautiful nude shade for the “innocent good girl” in you 😉

Forbidden 106 – this shade is in oxblood. It reminds me of the movie “The Devil Wears Prada”; it screams class and power!

The picture below shows a friend wearing the lip color in forbidden.

Advantages:

  • Long  lasting
  • Great packaging
  • Very pigmented
  • Weightless
  • Silky; feels great on the lips

Disadvantages:

  • Very matte (that is a very good thing for me though) hence it doesn’t necessarily add moisture to the lips; always moisturize your lips before applying.

These lip colors are a MUST-HAVE for every lady and you will definitely get 1 or more shades that will resonate with whatever personality you wish to project.

Thanks for stopping by, please share with your friends. I would love to read your comments, which of these shades would you love to have? More reviews to come, stay tuned to this space!

xoxo,

The Craftress.
excerpt: Hello fam this is my very first product review and I’m excited to get started so here goes… I love makeup, colors and getting to apply makeup on people is one of the most fulfilling activities I do.

title: ANITA: HANDCRAFTED PEARLS AND GOLD JEWELRY SET
content:
Are you wondering who Anita is? Yes I guessed right! Well, she’s the gorgeous handcrafted pearls and gold jewelry set sitting elegantly in the picture to your left.

For those new to my works, just so you don’t get confused, I name my jewelry pieces as each  one has it’s own life and style 😀 hehehe! But it’s true really.

You can never have too much of pearls, they are a girl’s best friend! This jewelry set is made up of pearls and gold filled findings. Whether you choose to adorn the stringed pearls or the mixture with gold balls, you’d be the talk of the party or meeting or whatever outing you choose to adorn this to. Don’t hesitate to buzz if you need one for yourself, we can also work out a variant to your satisfaction.

Handcrafted with Love,

The Craftress.

“A woman needs ropes and ropes of pearls.”- Coco Chanel.

title: WELCOME TO MY BLOG
content:
Welcome to my Blog Dear Friends!

Hello dear people. I’m sitting here grinning from teeth to teeth, utterly excited about this journey we are about to begin together. I’m also excited to be putting up my very first post here on our Independence Day. Happy Independence Day Nigeria, may your light break forth like the dawn! Before I go on and on about my current state of euphoria, let me introduce myself.

My name is Lara aka The Craftress 😉 I have a first degree in Computer Science with Economics although my Crafts have taken over completely for now. I love crafts; I enjoy working with my hands to create beauty. I am also passionate about national development so I like to refer to myself as a social entrepreneur. You all will discover more about me in the near future so let me stop here.

The Craftress Services Company is about three major services (& products):

  • Professional Makeup Artistry
  • Jewelry
  • Confectionery/Pastry

In addition to the above, I’m keen on training. The Craftress Services Co. has a crafts school where we train aspiring crafters to become financially independent while doing what they love (this is also linked to my social enterprise).

There’s so much to say but I don’t want to wear you out in 1 post. This is just background info; seat back and let’s enjoy this ride together. I would really love to meet you, may I know your name and what you enjoy doing?

xoxo,

The Craftress.
